Brand elements present: "DOAC" acronym in the top left corner, possibly branding the podcast/channel

THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.Visual reinforcement: The thumbnail repeats and highlights the main promise of the title with nearly identical phrasing, amplifying its directness. The words 'strip fat faster than anything' are visually accentuated in the thumbnail, mirroring the title's core claim. The presence of presumably knowledgeable guests facing off with microphones matches the subtitle ('Doctor') and adds authority and seriousness.
THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.Contrasts or mismatches: No significant mismatches. The thumbnail and title are highly aligned in tone, message, and visual style. Both heavily rely on the impact of the fat-loss promise and expert presence for appeal.
